description: This file implements HMAC (Hash-based Message Authentication Code) functions for TLS, including specific algorithms MD5 and SHA1. It provides functions for computing HMACs using these hash functions, supporting the TLS cryptography layer.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoHmac(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG mac_algorithm,void * i_secret,ULONG i_secret_size,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * o_hash,PULONG o_hash_size)
methods.description: Dispatches the HMAC operation to the appropriate algorithm based on the specified mac_algorithm (MD5 or SHA).

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoHmac_MD5(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,void * i_secret,ULONG i_secret_size,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * o_hash,PULONG o_hash_size)
methods.description: Performs HMAC using MD5 hash for the input data with the provided secret.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoHmac_SHA(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,void * i_secret,ULONG i_secret_size,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * o_hash,PULONG o_hash_size)
methods.description: Performs HMAC using SHA1 hash for the input data with the provided secret.
